channel.Title: Messy Test Feed
channel.description: This is a messy description with & entities

item.TITLE: Item with <HTML> entities & special chars
item.Description:
This description has bold and italic text.

It also has &emdash; and – (n-dash) and — (m-dash)

Smart quotes: “Hello” and ‘World’

item.title: Content Encoded Test
item.content:encoded:
Full Article Content

This uses content:encoded tag instead of description.

With some formatting and links.

item.title: Test “smartquotes” and –dashes—
item.description: Body with • bullet point and © copyright
